item.title: Journey 2010 East - NYC
item.description: About to begin journey anew... Leaving the NYC behind and going to travel Eastern US for next 6 months... so, I would like to dedicate this one to all of you out there, that made this trip possible... Here is to you Ron, Adam, Charles, Jac and Topher...
item.dc:creator: DJ Bojan
item.itunes:summary:
About to begin journey anew... Leaving the NYC behind and going to travel Eastern US for next 6 months... so, I would like to dedicate this one to all of you out there, that made this trip possible...
Here is to you Ron, Adam, Charles, Jac and Topher...
